author: sessionizill
title: DID for Music Business Backend
description: We're building a music streaming platform. Not anyone can upload, or it will be the Wild West. Only vetted record labels. We need DID.
solution: We need to leverage Atala Prism to power this DID service and create a walled garden around licensed copyrighted content.
experience: Over 20 years in the music business. I've already had conversations with CEOs of two prominent record labels who want to test our platform.
